channel.title: ESG Report on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ESG Report on FinanClub

item.title: JOBY
item.description: score:1050 Chances: Joby Aviation (NYSE: JOBY) issued its Q2 2023 Shareholder Letter with operational and financial results. The company is developing all-electric aircraft for commercial passenger service. Joby Aviation submitted Certification Plans to the FAA, progressing toward certifying its aircraft for commercial use.

item.title: CVE
item.description: score:1153 Chances: Cenovus Energy’s positive Q2 earnings aided by higher contributions and lower expenses. Earnings and revenue surprises for Cenovus Energy in the second quarter of 2023. Beat in profit estimates due to higher downstream throughput and better production margins. Strong cash generation and funds flow for Cenovus Energy in Q2 2023.
